item.title: Hot Reload MDX changes in Next.js and Nx
item.description: In the previous article we learned how to use next-mdx-remote to load and hydrate MDX content. In this article, we’re going to learn how to implement a custom server for our Next.js app with Nx, that allows us to auto-refresh the rendering whenever something in our MDX files changes.
